description: Health protection teams (HPT) provide specialist public health advice and operational support to NHS, local authorities and other agencies.

details.body:
What HPTs do

Local HPTs lead the UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA)’s response to all health-related incidents. They provide specialist support to prevent and reduce the impact of:

  • infectious diseases
  • chemical and radiation hazards
  • major emergencies

HPTs can help with:

  • local disease surveillance
  • maintaining alert systems
  • investigating and managing health protection incidents and outbreaks
  • implementing and monitoring national action plans for infectious diseases at local level

Use the find your local HPT in England postcode lookup if you’re a health professional needing expert local health protection advice.

North East HPT

This team covers:

  • County Durham

  • Teesside
  • Tyne and Wear

change_history.note:
Updated contact details for North London HPT as a result of the merging of the former North East and North Central London HPT and the North West London HPT. 
Updated the address for the South London HPT. 
Updated the London regional notification form.
Updated areas covered and contact information.
Updated contact details and added London Region Notification of Infectious Disease form for North East and North Central London HPT, North West London HPT, and South London HPT.
Updated address for North East and North Central London HPT and South London HPT.
Updated the email address for South East HPTs.
Updated Cumbria and Lancashire area list.
Updated contact details for Yorkshire and the Humber HPT.
Added East Midlands HPT notification form.
Updated contact details for West Midlands HPT.
Updated email addresses for Cheshire and Merseyside, Cumbria and Lancashire and Greater Manchester HPTs.
Updated email addresses for South East HPTs.
Updated contact details for East Midlands HPT.
Updated contact details for North East and North Central London HPT.
Amended Yorkshire HPT details.
Updated phone numbers and email addresses for the South East region HPTs.

Updated phone number for South Yorkshire HPT, and phone number options for North East, Cheshire and Merseyside and Greater Manchester HPTs. Added contact details for the London Coronavirus Response Cell to London HPTs.
Updated details for North East and North Central London HPT and North East HPT.
Avon, Gloucestershire and Wiltshire HPT and the South West Centre HPT combined to create the South West Region HPT.
Added London Coronavirus Response Cell contact details.
Updated advice on personal identifiable information.
Added guidance on sharing personal identifiable information for South London HPT.
Added guidance on sharing personal identifiable information, for North East and North Central London HPT.
Removed Anglia HPT contact details as this is now part of East of England HPT.
First published.

title: Contacts: UKHSA health protection teams
